jodd.bean

Class BeanVisitorImplBase<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.bean.BeanVisitor
      • jodd.bean.BeanVisitorImplBase<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InExRuleMatcher<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BeanCopy, BeanWalker

    public abstract class BeanVisitorImplBase<T>
extends BeanVisitor
    Default implementation of BeanVisitor for just setting the properties in fluent way.
